name: Epic Skater Man Game
description:
It's Time To Play New Skating Game - Epic Skater Man: Run, Jump And Fun Game

Try this exciting fun take on the regular running & Jumping games – skating game where you can enjoy the running game challenges with a better take. For the love of skating, here is an exciting skating game challenge - Epic Skater Man: Run, Jump And Fun Game.

It brings together the fun of real-time skating onto your fingertips through your iPhone. It is an amazingly easy to play 2D skating game with really smooth controls where you can skate through challenging obstacles. The character of the game – Epic Skater Man: Run, Jump And Fun Game can perform a lot of tricks on a skateboard to score points. While skating, you can collect stars and trophies to build your collection.

Get this free skating game & enjoy 30 carefully designed levels and multiple themes. More levels and themes are being added. Take the challenge & complete all levels to complete the game. Compete with skaters worldwide with the global leader board feature.

-------------------
HOW TO PLAY
-------------------
Epic Skater Man: Run, Jump And Fun Game has amazingly easy controls to help you get started instantly.

-Tab To Jump

---------------------
GAME FEATURES
---------------------
Are you still looking for reasons to download and start playing this amazing Skating Game? Here are top reasons why you should play this game.

- Beautiful game graphics to enhance your game play
- Easy controls. Just tap to jump
- Try multiple tricks with your skateboard
- Amazing game sounds for better experience
- 10+ carefully designed levels to test your skills
- Global leader board to compete with players worldwide
-Collect all coin and make good score

So, are you ready to take the skating challenge? Just download this app for free to get started.

---------------
SAY HELLO
---------------
We are constantly working hard on making the game better and more entertaining for you. We need your constant support to get going. Please feel free to email us for any queries/suggestions/problems or if you just want to say hi. We would love to hear from you. If you have enjoyed any feature of the “Epic Skater Man: Run, Jump And Fun Game”, do not forget to rate us on the app store. Also, do share this Skating Challenge game among your friends.

--------------------------
DOWNLOAD NOW
--------------------------
PLAY & ENJOY
---------------------
